channel.description: Recent content in python on Matt Carrier

item.title: Blender Set Frame Plugin
item.description:
Blender plugin to quickly set the render Frame Range start and end property from the currently selected sequence clip.

  • Quick set frame start and end button Plugin Download.

item.title: Setting up and deploying Python Flask to Dreamhost
item.description: I have a few applications I have written that run on Flask. Every time I would go to deploy a new application I would always seem to forget one of the minor details and end up with the ugly An error occurred importing your passenger_wsgi.py
